review: I ordered this a couple months ago and it worked fine the first couple times we used it. We have the fire box in our living room and we have the stick in our bedroom. We've had no problems with the box but after using the stick a couple time it suddenly stopped working. I waited a little while to see if it would start working again (sometimes our internet doesn't work). It never started working again so I called customer support and they sent me a new one right away. When I plugged the second one in it showed me the amazon logo and then did nothing after that it just kept the logo on the screen no matter what I pushed.  So I contacted customer support again and they are sending me a new one again. Hopefully this one works.  I found a chat forum on line about the stick and there were a lot of people that said they had the exact same problem.  Usually amazon is great with their quality of products but I'd say they completely failed with this one.
